entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
